T02D2294:206b-0: @206b * // dngos po'i gnas lugs bsgom pa bzhugs /
T02D2294:206b-2: # // dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2294:206b-3: phyag rgya bzhi la las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2294:206b-5: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2294:206b-7: de la las kyi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2294:206b-8: bud med de lo bcu gnyis sam /
T02D2294:206b-11: de yang yul dbus su skyes pa /
T02D2294:206b-13: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir skyes pa /
T02D2294:206b-19: sngags kyi nus pa dang ldan pa /
T02D2294:206b-21: de yang aa wa dh'u t'i ring ba'am /
T02D2294:206b-22: aa wa dh'u t'i ston pa'i nus pa can /
T02D2294:206b-27: de ni sems ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang rung /
T02D2294:206b-28: mi ldan pa yang rung ste /
T02D2294:206b-30: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02D2294:206b-31: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02D2294:206b-32: zhes slob dpon n'a gardzu nas gsungs pa'o //
T02D2294:206b-33: de la chos kyi phyag rgya ni /
T02D2294:206b-34: yid kyis mngon sum gyi yul gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang /
T02D2294:206b-39: don phyi rol du ma brtags pa shes pa'i snang ba tsam ste /
T02D2294:206b-40: de la dang po dga' ba dang /
T02D2294:206b-41: mchog dga'i lus kyi bde ba dang /
T02D2294:206b-42: phyi nas yid bde ba lhan cig skyes dga' ste /
T02D2294:206b-43: de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang /
T02D2294:206b-45: de'i steng du lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po snang stong gnyis med pa bsgom mo //
T02D2294:206b-46: de la yid skyon dga' bral du 'gyur ro //
T02D2294:206b-47: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni de la bzhi ste /
T02D2294:206b-49: gtum mo mar me gso ba dang /
T02D2294:206b-50: gtum mo srub shing gi 'khor lo dang /
T02D2294:206b-51: gtum mo ba spu'i bu ga bsgom pa'o //
T02D2294:206b-52: de la dang po ni spu mtshams nas lte ba'i
T02D2294:206b-53: bar du mar me sor brgyad pa cig bsams nas
T02D2294:207a-0: gnyis pa mar me gso ba ni spu mtshams nas lte bar phyin pas @207a * //
T02D2294:207a-1: lte ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pas gso ba'o //
T02D2294:207a-2: gsum pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i srub shing la
T02D2294:207a-3: la n'a dang ra sa n'a lte ba khrag gi
T02D2294:207a-4: thig le las me 'bar bas snying ga'i byang chub
T02D2294:207a-5: kyi sems zhu nas bde ba chen po bsgom mo
T02D2294:207a-6: // bzhi pa ba spu'i ni lte ba'i dbus su
T02D2294:207a-7: dug phra mo 'khyil ba bsgoms la steng gi rlung
T02D2294:207a-8: // mnan par bya'o // de ltar bsgom pa dang
T02D2294:207a-9: ldan pa'i tshe sa chu la thim pas du ba
T02D2294:207a-11: chu me la thim pas smig rgyu lta bu mthong ba dang /
T02D2294:207a-12: me rlung la thim pas srin bu me khyer lta bu mthong ba 'byung ba dang /
T02D2294:207a-13: rlung rnam par shes pa'i thim pas nam mkha' lta bu 'byung ba dang /
T02D2294:207a-14: rnam par shes pa rtog pa yin te /
T02D2294:207a-15: nam mkha' mi rtog pa la thim pas na /
T02D2294:207a-16: nam mkha' stong pa lta bu'i rtags 'byung ngo //
T02D2294:207a-17: de la phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa ni /
T02D2294:207a-19: gzung ba med de rang gi snang ba yin pas
T02D2294:207a-20: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyas btab ba'i bde ba
T02D2294:207a-21: chen po dang / 'dzin pa bde ba chen po'i
T02D2294:207a-22: rang bzhin yin pas mi bskyod pa'i rgyas btab pa
T02D2294:207a-23: chen po dang / dang / sems rang rig gnyis su med par yang mi bsam ste /
T02D2294:207a-24: bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas /
T02D2294:207a-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas btab pa dang /
T02D2294:207a-28: sgom pa po ro gcig pa gnyis su med pa'i rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D2294:207a-29: sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang rjes ro gcig par
T02D2294:207a-30: ro mnyam pa'i bde ba chen pos rgyas gdab pa
T02D2294:207a-31: dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D2294:207a-32: gnyis 'od gsal ba'i ngang du rgyas gdab pa dang
T02D2294:207a-33: dang / / snod kyi 'jig rten dang bcud kyi
T02D2294:207a-34: sems can brtan pa dang g-yo ba rnams he ru
T02D2294:207a-35: ka la rol pas rgyas gdab pa'o //
T02D2294:207a-36: de ltar rgyas dgus snod bcud kun bde stong gnyis kyis rgyas gdab /
T02D2294:207a-37: sems ni 'od gsal rgya mtsho las //
T02D2294:207a-38: glo bur dba' rlabs tshul du brtag / sems ni nam mkha' stong pa las //
T02D2294:207a-39: glo bur sprin gyi tshul du brtag / bsgom du med pa lhun grub bsgom //
T02D2294:207a-40: rtog pa'i dra ba ngang gis stong //
T02D2294:207a-41: mngon sum tshad mas mthong ba nyid //
T02D2294:207b-0: shes bya rnal ma @207b yin par gsal //
T02D2294:207b-1: rtog pa thams cad 'gog pa dang //
T02D2294:207b-2: mi rtog ye shes ngang la gzhag / bsgom du med pa bsgom pa yin //
T02D2294:207b-3: lhun gyis grub pa bsgom pa yin //
T02D2294:207b-4: rnam par rtog pa med pa la //
T02D2294:207b-5: rnam rtog med pa'i sgro mi gdags //
T02D2294:207b-6: dngos po gdod nas gnyis med la //
T02D2294:207b-7: gnyis med ces bya bsam mi bya //
T02D2294:207b-8: bde chen sgro skur bral ba la //
T02D2294:207b-9: bral lo snyam du bsams na skyon //
T02D2294:207b-10: nyams myong 'od gsal dag pa la //
T02D2294:207b-11: dag go zhes kyang rlom mi bya //
T02D2294:207b-12: rlom sems med pa gnas pa'i tshe //
T02D2294:207b-13: rtog pa rang gi ngang gis 'gag / chos dang gang zag bdag med ces //
T02D2294:207b-14: rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te //
T02D2294:207b-15: rtog pa'i rang bzhin 'od gsal bar //
T02D2294:207b-16: shes na de tshe nyid na 'gags //
T02D2294:207b-17: gnyen po'i rgyal po mngon sum yin //
T02D2294:207b-18: gcig dang du bral gtan tshigs rnams //
T02D2294:207b-19: 'od gsal shes na dgos pa med //
T02D2294:207b-20: glang po dngos su rnyed gyur nas //
T02D2294:207b-21: glang po'i rjes ni tshol byed dam //
T02D2294:207b-22: bde chen der snang mngon sum la //
T02D2294:207b-23: lus dang rjes dpag btsal mi dgos //
T02D2294:207b-24: myong ba dngos po'i gshis yin pas //
T02D2294:207b-25: chad par lta ba'i dogs pa med //
T02D2294:207b-26: gang la de'o mi sems pas ;
T02D2294:207b-27: / sgro 'dogs pa yi dogs pa med //
T02D2294:207b-28: snod bcud bde chen rgyas gdab pas //
T02D2294:207b-29: nyon mongs dgra las ldang dogs med //
T02D2294:207b-30: las la byed do bya'o zhes //
T02D2294:207b-31: dge sdig gang la'ang mi sems shing //
T02D2294:207b-32: rmi lam las khyad med pas //
T02D2294:207b-33: ngan song gsum gyi dogs pa med //
T02D2294:207b-34: gang dang gang la sems pa na //
T02D2294:207b-35: bde chen der snang ngo shes na //
T02D2294:207b-36: gnyen po gzhan zhig btsal mi dgos //
T02D2294:207b-37: bya ba btang ba'i sems nyid ni //
T02D2294:207b-38: lhun gyis grub par rnam par gnas //
T02D2294:207b-39: ji ltar chu la chu gzhag dang //
T02D2294:207b-40: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02D2294:207b-41: rang gis rang gi ye shes ni//
T02D2294:207b-42: legs mthong gang yin 'di phyag yin //
T02D2294:207b-43: de nyid gnyis med mchod pa yin //
T02D2294:207b-44: gnyen po stong nyid lta ba 'di //
T02D2294:207b-45: sdig pa bshags pa'i mchog yin te //
T02D2294:207b-46: me dang grang ba'i reg pa bzhin //
T02D2294:207b-48: rjes su yi rang la sogs dang //
T02D2294:208a-2: don dam byang chub sems 'di mchog / stong nyid
T02D2294:208a-3: mngon sum mthong ste mchog / dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg
T02D2294:208a-4: bzlas brjod kyi // nang na bde chen dkyil 'khor mchog / gang dang gang la blo gzhag pa //
T02D2294:208a-5: de dang de ni bde chen du //
T02D2294:208a-6: shes na mal cha stan dag dang //
T02D2294:208a-7: g-yog 'khor gnyen bshes snang ba kun //
T02D2294:208a-8: bde chen shes pa bsgoms pas chog / snod ni gzhal yas khang yin la //
T02D2294:208a-9: bcud ni lha dang lha mo yin //
T02D2294:208a-10: 'gro ba rigs drug bde gshegs drug / dmyal ba'i 'jig rten bde ba can //
T02D2294:208a-11: yi dags dud 'gro bde chen gyi //
T02D2294:208a-12: ngang du shes pa lha yi sku //
T02D2294:208a-13: sems la bkag pa med pa nyid //
T02D2294:208a-14: gnyen po mchog tu kho yis mthong //
T02D2294:208a-15: dper na rmi lam gnas skabs na //
T02D2294:208a-16: bde dang sdug bsngal snang ba kun //
T02D2294:208a-17: sad par gyur pa ro gcig ltar //
T02D2294:208a-18: de bzhin 'khor ba'i bde sdug kun //
T02D2294:208a-19: skye med ngang du mnyam pas na //
T02D2294:208a-20: rnal 'byor sems la blang dor med //
T02D2294:208a-21: dgra sdang rmi lam 'drar shes nas //
T02D2294:208a-22: chags sdang gnyen po bsgom mi dgos //
T02D2294:208a-23: sems kyi rang bzhin yongs shes na //
T02D2294:208a-24: chos nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos //
T02D2294:208a-25: dus gsum khams gsum tha snyad du //
T02D2294:208a-26: bems po glo bur yin shes na //
T02D2294:208a-27: sems kyi rang bzhin bcos mi dgos //
T02D2294:208a-28: skye 'gag nam mkha'i skra shad bzhin //
T02D2294:208a-29: snga phyi skye bas stong pas na //
T02D2294:208a-30: ma skyes zhes su bsgom pa med //
T02D2294:208a-31: rgyal pa'i thugs gzhi rtog med la //
T02D2294:208a-32: skye ba med pa zhes su bsgrags //
T02D2294:208a-33: gnyen po spang bya dbyer med kyi //
T02D2294:208a-34: don la bya btsal med pa nyid //
T02D2294:208a-35: btang snyoms chen po bsgom pa'i mchog / dper na mi 'ga' btson byas na //
T02D2294:208a-37: de nyid brtson par gtad nas ni //
T02D2294:208a-38: 'bad rtsol med par gnas pa bzhin //
T02D2294:208a-39: nyon mongs 'bad pas bkag kyang ni //
T02D2294:208a-41: de nyid bdag nyid lcags bkrol nas //
T02D2294:208a-42: yul la rang dga' btang na ni //
T02D2294:208a-43: rang gi ngang gis rtog med skye //
T02D2294:208a-44: des na thabs la mkhas pa yin //
T02D2294:208a-45: 'bras bu lam du byed par gsungs //
T02D2294:208a-46: blun po yod med sdug bsngal kyang //
T02D2294:208b-0: @208b gdod nas skye ba ma myong la //
T02D2294:208b-1: mkhas pa 'gag pa sems la med //
T02D2294:208b-2: ched kar gnyen po bsgom mi dgos //
T02D2294:208b-3: rnal 'byor nang du kha bltas la //
T02D2294:208b-4: sems las ma gtogs myong med pas //
T02D2294:208b-5: snang srid rtag dang mi rtag la //
T02D2294:208b-6: bkag pa dang ni sgrub pa med //
T02D2294:208b-7: sems kyang ye shes yin shes na //
T02D2294:208b-8: mya ngan 'das pa bstan mi dgos //
T02D2294:208b-9: gal te chags sdang skyes gyur kyang //
T02D2294:208b-10: gnyen po mi sdug byams sogs ni //
T02D2294:208b-12: ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs dag / nam mkha'i dbyings su thim pa ltar //
T02D2294:208b-13: dngos po 'od gsal glo bur bcas //
T02D2294:208b-14: phyis ni rang gi ngang 'gags na //
T02D2294:208b-15: gnyen po dag ni su la bsgom //
T02D2294:208b-16: ma rig 'khrul pa'i bag chags kyis //
T02D2294:208b-17: sems la smig rgyu bzhin snang na //
T02D2294:208b-18: mi mkhas smig rgyu 'tshos pa bzhin //
T02D2294:208b-19: gnyen po bsgom pa kye re mtshar //
T02D2294:208b-20: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D2294:208b-21: skye ba nyid kyang mi brtan na //
T02D2294:208b-22: glo bur rtag par ga la 'gyur //
T02D2294:208b-23: de bas gnyen po mi bsgom ste //
T02D2294:208b-24: gnyen po med cing bsgom pa'ang med //
T02D2294:208b-30: 'du mi byed ces sems pa med //
T02D2294:208b-31: mngon sum rtog bral rgyun bsrings nas //
T02D2294:208b-32: bsgoms so zhes su tha snyad 'dogs //
T02D2294:208b-33: rtog med ye nas skye na yang //
T02D2294:208b-34: sgro 'dogs sel ba bsgom pa yin ;
T02D2294:208b-35: / bcos med rang gsal ma byas na //
T02D2294:208b-36: nan gyis mi rtog bsgoms gyur kyang //
T02D2294:208b-37: mi rtog pan yid sgrib pa'i rgyu //
T02D2294:208b-38: dper na sman nyid ma zhu na //
T02D2294:208b-39: nad kyi nang na de nyid lci //
T02D2294:208b-40: 'bad med bsgoms la sgro 'dogs bcad ces bya //
T02D2294:208b-41: sgyu ma chu zla bzhin du shes med na //
T02D2294:208b-42: stong zhes brjod pas sems la yongs mi 'gro //
T02D2294:208b-43: sems kyi rang bzhin snang stong rtogs na ni //
T02D2294:208b-44: 'gro ba rnams la snying rje ngang gis skye //
T02D2294:208b-45: bdag dang gzhan dag dbye ba med par yang //
T02D2294:208b-46: chu zla lta bur blo ni skye 'gyur na //
T02D2294:208b-47: bde ba chen po sgom zhes de la bya //
T02D2294:209a-1: bha gar bde ba rtog med myong //
T02D2294:209a-2: gang zhig me long gzugs brnyan snang ba dang //
T02D2294:209a-3: gang zhig gtum mo drod las bde myong dang //
T02D2294:209a-4: gang zhig dgod dang lta dang lag bcangs dang //
T02D2294:209a-5: 'o byas 'khyud pa bde ba dam pa myong //
T02D2294:209a-6: rtog med myong bar gyur kyang bde chen gyis //
T02D2294:209a-7: rgyas ma btab na byang chub med do zhes //
T02D2294:209a-8: rdo rje 'chang ba gsung zhing tshad mas grub //
T02D2294:209a-9: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rgyas gdab bya //
T02D2294:209a-10: rgyas gdab ces bya'i don ni ngo bo yang //
T02D2294:209a-11: dmigs pa'i yul ni sgyu mar ma zad kyi //
T02D2294:209a-12: rang gi myong ba sgyu mar mngon sum du //
T02D2294:209a-13: rig pa de la rgyas gdab rjes su brjod //
T02D2294:209a-14: rtog pa re res bcad pa rgyas gdab min //
T02D2294:209a-15: de bzhin rjes dpag bsgom pa rgyas gdab med //
T02D2294:209a-16: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor spros dang bral ba yi //
T02D2294:209a-17: mngon sum der snang rgya yi rnam par byung //
T02D2294:209a-18: des na rgyas gdab ces ni bya bar bshad //
T02D2294:209a-19: 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol dag / bde chen mnyam par shes te bsgoms pas na //
T02D2294:209a-20: 'da' ba'i man ngag gzhan nas btsal mi dgos //
T02D2294:209a-21: sems kyi rang bzhin chos kyi skur shes na //
T02D2294:209a-22: 'bras bu thob byas sar du btsal ba med //
T02D2294:209a-23: sems kyi ngang las 'phel 'grib med shes na //
T02D2294:209a-24: bsgom pa shor yang spogs pa btsal mi dgos //
T02D2294:209a-25: legs byas nyes byas glo bur yin shes na //
T02D2294:209a-26: dam tshig nyams chags bshags pa de nyid yin //
T02D2294:209a-27: ji ltar snang ba de ltar bden //
T02D2294:209a-28: ji ltar btags pa de ltar med //
T02D2294:209a-29: ji ltar btsal ba de ltar skyon //
T02D2294:209a-30: ji ltar bsams pa de ltar bral //
T02D2294:209a-31: yul ni gang dang gang dag la //
T02D2294:209a-32: rtog bral gsal ba skyes gyur na //
T02D2294:209a-33: de'i tshe de 'ong mi'i sems la //
T02D2294:209a-34: de ni stong nyid bsgom pa yin //
T02D2294:209a-35: rang rig gnyis med bsgom pa zhes //
T02D2294:209a-36: gang la gdams ngag phog gyur kyang //
T02D2294:209a-37: gnyis med nyid du ma myong na //
T02D2294:209a-38: gang zhig bstan kyang ming du zad //
T02D2294:209a-39: yul ni gang dang gang dag la //
T02D2294:209a-40: thams cad las ni sems bsdus na //
T02D2294:209a-41: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo med par //
T02D2294:209a-42: gnas pas mig gis gzugs dag gam //
T02D2294:209a-43: gnas pas rna bas sgra dag gam //
T02D2294:209b-0: gnas pas sna yis dri @209b dag gam //
T02D2294:209b-1: gnas pas lce yis ro dag gam //
T02D2294:209b-2: gnas pas lus kyis reg dag gam //
T02D2294:209b-3: gnas pas yid kyis chos dag gam //
T02D2294:209b-4: shes pa'i blo de rtog bral yin //
T02D2294:209b-5: rtog pa'i skye dang 'gag pa dang //
T02D2294:209b-6: rang rig gnyis kyis myong bas na //
T02D2294:209b-7: rtog dang bral bas mngon du grub /
T02D2294:209b-8: gang zhig rtog bral don de la //
T02D2294:209b-9: tshor ba bde ba la brten nas /
T02D2294:209b-10: bsgoms pas pho nya'i lam du gyur //
T02D2294:209b-11: gang la dang po rtog med la //
T02D2294:209b-12: dga' ba zhes su bshad pa yin //
T02D2294:209b-13: rtog bral bde chen gnyis pa la //
T02D2294:209b-14: mchog dga' zhes su bshad pa yin //
T02D2294:209b-15: de ni lus kyi bde ba ste //
T02D2294:209b-17: rtog dang bral ba gsum pa ni //
T02D2294:209b-18: lhan cig skyes dga' zhes bshad de //
T02D2294:209b-19: yid kyi mngon sum bde ba yin //
T02D2294:209b-20: gzung 'dzin dri ma dang bral bas //
T02D2294:209b-21: myong bas gsal ba skye ba ni //
T02D2294:209b-22: rang rig bde chen zhes su bshad /
T02D2294:209b-23: gang zhig rtog pas bar bcad nas //
T02D2294:209b-25: phyag rgya bzhi yi yul rnams las //
T02D2294:209b-26: tshor ba bde bas skyes gyur pas //
T02D2294:209b-27: rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i stobs ldan pas //
T02D2294:209b-28: rtog dang bcas pas skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2294:209b-29: de bas bde ba'i ting 'dzin las ;
T02D2294:209b-30: / rnal 'byor ba yi yid gzhag nas //
T02D2294:209b-31: gnyis med bde chen bsgom par bya //
T02D2294:209b-32: gang zhig bde ba'i ting 'dzin las //
T02D2294:209b-33: sems 'jog pa ni zhi gnas yin //
T02D2294:209b-34: des na dga' dang mchog dga' dang //
T02D2294:209b-35: lhan skyes dga' ba phul byung yang //
T02D2294:209b-36: zhi gnas sems las mi 'da' ste //
T02D2294:209b-37: lus dang yid kyi bde bar zad //
T02D2294:209b-38: bde chen don gyis rgyas gdab na //
T02D2294:209b-39: lhag mthong phul du byung bar 'gyur //
T02D2294:209b-40: gang zhig bde ba'i chos can la //
T02D2294:209b-41: stong nyid sgrub pa gang yin pa //
T02D2294:209b-42: lhan cig skyes dga' yin snyam ste //
T02D2294:209b-43: de ni rjes dpag bsgom pa'i lam //
T02D2294:209b-44: so sor rtog pa'i rnal 'byor te //
T02D2294:209b-45: bde ba chen po myong ba'ang med //
T02D2294:209b-46: 'od gsal bde ba'i rgya mtsho las //
T02D2294:209b-47: dga' bde dpa' rlabs tshul du shes //
T02D2294:209b-48: de nyid stong pa bsgom pa yin //
T02D2294:209b-49: bde dang yid bde gang yin las //
T02D2294:210a-2: gtan tshigs la sogs don med yin //
T02D2294:210a-3: chu ni dang bar gyur pa las //
T02D2294:210a-4: nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar //
T02D2294:210a-5: de bzhin stong gsal rang bzhin las //
T02D2294:210a-6: sna tshogs shes pa ldang zhing 'gag / sned bcud bde chen rgyas btab pas //
T02D2294:210a-7: sems kyi glang po yan btang yang //
T02D2294:210a-8: gnas ma rnyed nas ldog par 'gyur //
T02D2294:210a-9: dngos po gsal ba mthong na yang //
T02D2294:210a-10: de de bde bas rgyas btab nas //
T02D2294:210a-11: g-yeng ba nyid kyang g-yeng ba min //
T02D2294:210a-12: spyod lam ro mnyam yin shes nas //
T02D2294:210a-14: rgyu 'bras med kyang rgyas btab pas //
T02D2294:210a-15: skye ba nyid na'ang skye ba med //
T02D2294:210a-16: 'gag pa thim pa'i rgyas btab pas //
T02D2294:210a-17: bkag tsam nyid na'ang 'gag pa med //
T02D2294:210a-18: bde gshegs rnams ni bde chen nyid kyi sku //
T02D2294:210a-19: chos rnams thams cad bde gshegs nyid dang mnyam //
T02D2294:210a-20: byis pa'i blo can dngos la zhen pa rnams//
T02D2294:210a-21: rnam par rtog pas brtags pa nyid la spyod //
T02D2294:210a-22: dngos rnams thams cad bcos su med na yang //
T02D2294:210a-23: grub mtha' ngan pas bslad pas 'chos par byed //
T02D2294:210a-24: gdod nas rnam dag 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings //
T02D2294:210a-25: bde gshegs chos kyi sku yis mkhyen par mnyam //
T02D2294:210a-26: 'khor ba'i phung po sgyu mar rnam dag shes //
T02D2294:210a-27: longs spyod rdzogs sku sgyu mar yang dag mnyam //
T02D2294:210a-28: gal te sgyu ma'i rgyun la bde sdug dang //
T02D2294:210a-29: dga' dang gdung ba'i bye brag yod min yang //
T02D2294:210a-30: der snang skad cig rer gnas pa las //
T02D2294:210a-31: bde chen bde ba chen po nyid du gcig / rnam par rtog pa tha dad med na yang //
T02D2294:210a-32: mi rtog ngang las ro gcig gyur par snang //
T02D2294:210a-33: dang po'i las can so so'i skye bo la //
T02D2294:210a-34: bde ba lam du byed par gsungs na yang //
T02D2294:210a-35: gang zhig bla ma'i phan pa'i lung thob nas //
T02D2294:210a-36: bde sdug thams cad bde ba chen por 'gyur //
T02D2294:210a-37: gang zhig stong nyid mi shes pa //
T02D2294:210a-38: de la thar pa'i skal ba med //
T02D2294:210a-39: 'gro drug srid pa'i btson ra ru //
T02D2294:210a-41: de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis //
T02D2294:210a-42: stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas na //
T02D2294:210a-43: blo ni gzhan don la dga' bar //
T02D2294:210a-44: 'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med //
T02D2294:210b-0: @210b sems can gang yin thams cad sngon //
T02D2294:210b-1: pha ma mdza' bshes rtsa lag tu //
T02D2294:210b-2: gyur cing phan chen btags pas na //
T02D2294:210b-3: byas pa gzo ba nyid du bya //
T02D2294:210b-4: sems can la brten bla med pa'i //
T02D2294:210b-5: sangs rgyas go 'phang nyid thob na //
T02D2294:210b-6: tshangs dbang drag po 'jig rten skyong //
T02D2294:210b-7: sogs pa 'thob pa mtshar ci che //
T02D2294:210b-8: sems can phan pa byas tsam gyis //
T02D2294:210b-9: 'gro ba gsum pa dam par skye //
T02D2294:210b-10: sems can gnod pas sdug bsngal ni //
T02D2294:210b-11: rnam pa du ma'i tshul dag gis //
T02D2294:210b-12: dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro ru //
T02D2294:210b-13: sems can rnams ni nye bar spyod //
T02D2294:210b-14: dngos po kun gyis mgu bya ba //
T02D2294:210b-15: rang lus bzhin du bsrung bar bya //
T02D2294:210b-16: 'bad pas sems can mi dga' ba //
T02D2294:210b-17: dug dang 'dra ba spang bar bya //
T02D2294:210b-18: sems can yongs su ma btang bas //
T02D2294:210b-19: sangs rgyas byang chub kun du 'thob //
T02D2294:210b-20: gzhan gyi gnod pa ma bzod pas //
T02D2294:210b-21: mnar med du yang skye bar byed //
T02D2294:210b-22: rang gi lus dang nor sbyin pa //
T02D2294:210b-25: mtshar zhes bya ba 'di min te //
T02D2294:210b-26: chos 'di stong par shes nas su //
T02D2294:210b-27: las kyi 'bras bu bsten byed pa //
T02D2294:210b-28: mtshar ba bas kyang 'di mtshar zhing //
T02D2294:210b-29: ngo mtshar bas kyang ngo mtshar ro //
T02D2294:210b-30: sems can bskyab pa'i bsam pa 'dis //
T02D2294:210b-31: srid pa'i 'dam du skyes mod kyi //
T02D2294:210b-32: padma la ni chu bzhin du //
T02D2294:210b-33: srid pa'i skyon gyis de ma gos //
T02D2294:210b-34: bzang po la sogs rgyal ba'i sras //
T02D2294:210b-35: 'di na ye shes me yis ni //
T02D2294:210b-36: nyon mongs bud shing bsregs bzhin du //
T02D2294:210b-37: 'on kyang thugs rje'i bslab pa mdzad //
T02D2294:210b-38: byang chub che dang 'chi dang skye //
T02D2294:210b-39: dur khrod gshegs dang dka' spyod mdzad //
T02D2294:210b-40: bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa dang //
T02D2294:210b-41: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang ;
T02D2294:210b-42: / lha yul gshegs dang mya ngan 'das //
T02D2294:210b-43: de bzhin khyim nas byung ba rnams //
T02D2294:210b-44: snying rje'i dbang gis 'jug pa yis //
T02D2294:210b-45: 'gro ba'i mgon po ston par mdzad //
T02D2294:210b-46: tshangs dbang nye dbang drag sogs kyi //
T02D2294:210b-47: gzugs kyis rab tu 'jug mdzad cing //
T02D2294:211a-1: thugs rjes thugs kyis rol ba mdzad //
T02D2294:211a-2: theg pa gnyis po dag kyang ni //
T02D2294:211a-3: theg pa chen por 'byung bas na //
T02D2294:211a-4: srid pa'i lam gyis dub pa rnams //
T02D2294:211a-5: ngal bos don de de nyid min //
T02D2294:211a-6: nyan thos de dag de srid du //
T02D2294:211a-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma bskul bar //
T02D2294:211a-8: de srid ye shes lus gcig gis //
T02D2294:211a-9: ting 'dzin dregs pas myos te gnas //
T02D2294:211a-10: bskul nas sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni //
T02D2294:211a-11: sems can don la dga' byed cing //
T02D2294:211a-12: bsod nams ye shes nyer 'phel nas //
T02D2294:211a-14: bag chags las ni byung bas na //
T02D2294:211a-15: bag chags sa bon dag tu bshad //
T02D2294:211a-16: bag chags rjes mthong tshogs pa na //
T02D2294:211a-17: srid pa'i myu gu de bskyed do //
T02D2294:211a-18: stong nyid smra bas smra byed cing //
T02D2294:211a-19: rtag tu lus ngag yid gsum gyis //
T02D2294:211a-20: 'di ltar sems can don byed pa ;
T02D2294:211a-21: / chad par smra ba yod ma yin //
T02D2294:211a-23: dper na gser 'gyur zangs lcags thams cad la //
T02D2294:211a-24: gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa'i thabs rnyed na //
T02D2294:211a-25: thams cad kha dog gser du 'gyur ba ltar //
T02D2294:211a-26: sems kyang bde chen ngang du ro gcig 'gyur //
T02D2294:211a-27: sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer bla mas //
T02D2294:211a-28: rtog dang bral ba'i stong pa'i rnam pa skyes //
T02D2294:211a-29: de bzhin sgyu 'drar sems kyi sgyu 'drar shes //
T02D2294:211a-30: bde chen rgyas btab bdag byin brlab pa la //
T02D2294:211a-31: sgyu ma'i dpe yis don rnams btsal mi dgos //
T02D2294:211a-32: thams cad sgyu 'dra mi 'drar dgag sgrub byed ;
T02D2294:211a-33: / phyag rgya'i lam la bde ba stong par shes //
T02D2294:211a-34: chos kyi mdo don sems kyis stong par shes //
T02D2294:211a-35: chos rnams kun la yod med dgag sgrub med //
T02D2294:211a-36: rtog med mngon sum lam la blo gzhag pas //
T02D2294:211a-37: rtags kyis rjes 'brangs gzhan sel dgos pa med //
T02D2294:211a-38: dus gsum bde gshegs ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar //
T02D2294:211a-39: gang du kha bltas sems kyi gsang shes pas //
T02D2294:211a-40: sgrib pa kun zad ye shes phun tshogs shing //
T02D2294:211a-41: sangs rgyas zhing grol sems can thams cad sgrol //
T02D2294:211a-42: thams cad bzang rgyu nyid du gyur par nges //
T02D2294:211b-0: ji ltar sbrul @211b gyi rang bzhin shes pa na //
T02D2294:211b-1: de yi dug ni gnod par mi 'gyur te //
T02D2294:211b-2: gang zhig nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rang bzhin shes //
T02D2294:211b-3: des ni de ma thag tu nges grol 'gyur //
T02D2294:211b-4: de nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas shing //
T02D2294:211b-5: de nyid kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms //
T02D2294:211b-6: bde chen lam la brten nas ni ;
T02D2294:211b-7: / thams cad byas kyang rnam par grol //
T02D2294:211b-8: rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs shing //
T02D2294:211b-9: gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas //
T02D2294:211b-10: ye shes 'dus ma byas pa ste //
T02D2294:211b-11: rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa'o //
T02D2294:211b-12: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D2294:211b-13: he ni rgyu sogs spangs pa yin//
T02D2294:211b-14: ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba //
T02D2294:211b-15: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa //
T02D2294:211b-16: sems kyi ngang la rnam gnas na //
T02D2294:211b-17: mya ngan 'das pa bstan du med //
T02D2294:211b-18: bde chen rtogs pa'i man ngag 'di //
T02D2294:211b-19: sdeb sbyor go rims bsgrigs pa min //
T02D2294:211b-20: nyams myong rtogs pa'i phan pa'i lung //
T02D2294:211b-21: dam pa'i spyi bos blang bar mdzod //
T02D2294:211b-22: dngos po'i gnas lugs bsgom pa zhes bya ba /
